known_issues: After a successful match, the chat area shows blank and the other user's profile in the chats section does not load, preventing messaging between matched users.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend Chat and Matches flows to avoid a blank screen when matched user profile/chat data is loading or fails. Ensure the UI shows an explicit loading state and a clear error message (and keeps the back navigation usable) when `useGetUserProfile(recipientId)` or `useGetChat(recipientId)` fails.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix backend profile visibility so that a user can load the other personâ€™s profile in the Matches list and Chat screen after a match (while still preventing arbitrary profile browsing). Specifically, update `getUserProfile(user : Principal)` to allow access when `caller == user` OR when `caller` and `user` are part of an existing match; otherwise keep the current authorization trap behavior.

projectName: Fix blank chat and missing matched user profile loading
